short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assists with Amazon arbitrage research and website trust checking

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
Enhance your Amazon arbitrage business with our Chrome extension designed specifically to streamline your product research process. This tool provides a comprehensive checklist to ensure you don't miss any critical steps when evaluating potential products.

Key Features:

Customizable Checklists: Create and manage a detailed checklist for each product you're researching. Track your progress with ease, ensuring all necessary actions are completed.
Complaint Checker: Quickly check for product complaints with a single click. This feature directs you to external sites, helping you identify potential red flags before making a purchase.
Selling Eligibility Verification: Verify if Amazon allows you to sell the product by linking directly to relevant pages, saving you time and effort.
Product-Specific Data Retention: Your progress is saved for each product using its unique ASIN (Amazon Standard Identification Number). This means that when you return to a previously researched product, all your notes and checklist items are exactly as you left them.
Efficient Workflow: Product identifiers are automatically copied to your clipboard, making it simple to paste and access information across different sites.
How It Works:

Open the Product Page on Amazon: Start your research with any product.
Use the Checklist: Follow the structured checklist to ensure you cover all critical aspects of product research.
Check for Complaints: Use the integrated links to check for any product complaints.
Verify Selling Eligibility: Quickly verify if you are allowed to sell the product on Amazon.
Save and Switch: Your checklist progress is saved for each product, allowing you to switch between products seamlessly.
Why You Need It:

Stay Organized: Keep track of your research progress and ensure thorough evaluations.
Save Time: Direct links and automatic data retention streamline your workflow.
Avoid Mistakes: Comprehensive checklists help prevent overlooked details and potential issues.
Get Started Today:
Install the Product Research Checklist for Amazon Arbitrage and take your product research to the next level. Simplify your workflow, stay organized, and make informed decisions with confidence.
